example.eg: The professor noticed Andrea's absence on the day of the exam.
example.egtrans: 教授注意到安德里亚在考试那天缺席了。

example.eg: During the boss's absence, two employees stole all of the office computers.
example.egtrans: 上司缺勤期间，两个员工偷了办公室所有电脑。

example.eg: There was an absence of remorse in John's apology.
example.egtrans: 约翰的道歉中缺乏悔过之情。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 由于...缺席, 由于...缺失

example.eg: My company granted me a leave of absence to care for my father.
example.egtrans: 我的公司准了我的事假，让我去照顾父亲。

example.eg: I took a four-month leave of absence to travel.
You'll fail the class if you have too many unexcused absences.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 未经允许的离开, 无故缺勤（逃课、旷课等）, 擅自缺勤（旷课）
